name: IPT - Hide Adverts
description: Hides the top adverts, donation prompts, etc.
additional_info:
Note: Due to a lack of structure to the IPTorrents HTML source, it's hard to write rules that are generic enough to target all of their different types of advertisting, while not affecting legit content.

If the style is not working as intended after IPT updates, please use the feedback feature or send a PM and I will try to update as necessary.
